name: Feel.Ings
description: The world went 3.0 and with it a massive load of big data suddenly fill our lives and mostly the communication channels and our underline relationship's time and space as well as new shapes for the messages we so carry on our souls. In an age when we spend lesser and lesser time and effort on one of the most important nature mankind has ever possess: transmission... sorry, communication of our deepest feelings and thoughts! We present you a game where the player (ourselves) must engage in communication holding no emotions whatsoever, and by simple graphical representation of emotional states (emoji icons) we abusively use every day, try to communicate with these strange non-verbal interlocutors, whose help will be critical to surpass the multiple platform game obstacles and thus ensuring safeness and success.
